Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>cchantep</groupId>
  <artifactId>maven-template-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.0</version>
  <type>${project.packaging</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'cchantep:maven-template-plugin:${project.packaging:1.0'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="cchantep" name="maven-template-plugin" rev="1.0">
  <artifact name="maven-template-plugin" type="${project.packaging" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='cchantep', module='maven-template-plugin', version='1.0')
)

Grails

compile 'cchantep:maven-template-plugin:1.0'

Leiningen

[cchantep/maven-template-plugin "1.0"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "cchantep" %% "maven-template-plugin" % "1.0"
